fr.formation.business

Class Funding

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.formation.business.Funding

  • public class Funding
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a loan.
    Author:
    Philippe AMICE

      • Funding

        public Funding(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
               java.lang.String loanType,
               long duration,
               java.math.BigDecimal interestRate,
               java.time.LocalDate startDate,
               java.math.BigDecimal insuranceRate)
        throws IllegalAmountException,
               IllegalDateException,
               IllegalDurationException,
               IllegalAmountException,
               IllegalRateException
        constructor with all fields mandatory
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of the loan must be greater than or equal to 1000
        loanType - type of loan (RE - Real Estate, AU - Automotive, WO - Works)
        duration - term of the loan
        interestRate - fixed interest rate of the loan
        startDate - date of the first monthly payment
        insuranceRate - insurance rate
        Throws:
        IllegalAmountException - non valid amount
        IllegalDateException - non valid date
        IllegalDurationException - non valid duration
        IllegalRateException - non valid rate
